alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Florence and northwestern Williamsburg Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cades, or near Kingstree, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Cades, Hebron, Lake City Community Hospital and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
